title: How Bears Come Out Of Hibernation Jacked
description: Spring is in the air — and so are black bears coming out of hibernation. Rae Wynn-Grant, a large carnivore biologist, explains there's a lot more going on during hibernation than you might expect.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: How Bears Come Out Of Hibernation Jacked
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: We chat with wildlife ecologist Rae Wynn-Grant about all the unique things that go down as black bears hibernate.
itunes:subtitle: We chat with wildlife ecologist Rae Wynn-Grant about all the unique things that go down as black bears hibernate.
content:encoded: Spring is in the air — and so are black bears coming out of hibernation. Rae Wynn-Grant, a large carnivore biologist, explains there's a lot more going on during hibernation than you might expect.
